name: Townsfolk Are Tasty
description:
You awake, surrounded by occultists. ‘We offer you our services, master’! And served they did - as food - but you’re still hungry…

This is my entry for the 2018 7DRL challenge. You play as the Night Terror, a hungry monster that stalks a hapless town looking for victims to feed on.

Find more of my stuff over at http://antumbrastation.com/
